pullrequest.title: Fix timeout for speed regression test

content.raw:
Nate:  reason for slow down:  1.2 has no throttle in `World.cc` for `World::ProcessFactoryMsgs()` calls, while 1.3 has a 5 Hz default and the proper sleep throttle in `World::Step()`.  Spawn behavior is expected to slow down.

...so this patch looks good for this particular bug.
content.html:
Nate: reason for slow down: 1.2 has no throttle in World.cc for World::ProcessFactoryMsgs() calls, while 1.3 has a 5 Hz default and the proper sleep throttle in World::Step(). Spawn behavior is expected to slow down.

...so this patch looks good for this particular bug.
